description: Tracks items an actor is actively wielding in a combat-ready or threatening manner. Presence indicates the actor has one or more items in wielding stance.

wielded_item_ids.description: Entity IDs of items currently being wielded. Order may indicate primary/secondary preference.

activityMetadata.description: Inline metadata for activity description generation.

shouldDescribeInActivity.description: Whether this component should be included in activity descriptions.

template.description: Template with {targets} placeholder for multiple item names.

targetRoleIsArray.description: Signals that targetRole points to an array, enabling list formatting.

priority.description: Display priority for activity ordering. 70 = active combat stance.
